name: Cloud Devs
tagline: Hire from our exclusive pool of top 5% developers
description:
Hire from our exclusive pool of top 5% developers. Build your next app, eCommerce or website with our pool of hand-picked top 8000+ software developers in Europe. Matched to you in under 24 hours. We started Cloud Devs because we knew there was a better way for developers and businesses to collaborate. A way that valued quality over competing on the lowest price. Where quality was the native currency.
As former developers, we built the platform we always wished for, and over the past 3 years, companies have trusted us to source developers for over Â£20M in projects.
